summary: This document is an email chain from December 2018 discussing a CNN article about Jeffrey Epstein's sealed federal indictment and a prior non-prosecution agreement. It involves coordination between an Assistant United States Attorney and an Assistant Special Agent in Charge regarding a meeting to discuss next steps on the Epstein matter.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email chain discusses a CNN article about his case, referencing a sealed federal indictment and a prior non-prosecution agreement.

events.title: CNN article on Epstein indictment
events.description: A CNN article is referenced discussing Epstein's lawsuit settlement and notably mentioning a sealed federal indictment, revealing he had been indicted when he received a prior deal.

events.title: Meeting with case agents
events.description: A meeting is scheduled with case agents to discuss next steps regarding the Epstein matter.

keyFacts: The email references a sealed federal indictment against Jeffrey Epstein, which the sender notes they hadn't realized existed when Epstein previously received a deal.
The correspondence involves an Assistant United States Attorney and an Assistant Special Agent in Charge coordinating to discuss the Epstein case.
A CNN article from December 4, 2018, is cited as the source of information about Epstein's indictment and lawsuit settlement.
